Define Documentation

#define FAIL ( msg   ) 
Value:
\
do { \
        printf("%s: Process %d (%s)\n", timestamp(), rank, hostname); \
        if (debug) \
                printf("\tFAILED in %s:%d:%s()\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); \
        else \
                printf("\tFAILED in %s()\n", __func__); \
        printf("%s", msg); \
        fflush(stdout); \
        MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD, 1); \
} while(0)
